action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,
Can we please add 2 additional sentences to the text below that is in the “Important information in your upcoming installation” memo. The additional text I’ve highlighted in bold


Installation day and photography : We can only provide an indicative timeframe to complete your installation. Completion times vary for each property and therefore we highly recommend property photography not be scheduled on the same day. Please ensure our team has free and clear access to the property entrance and the rooms we are styling. COVID19 changes, limiting the number of people onsite – to abide the Department of Health’s guidelines on social distancing, we can only install or collect our furniture where the property has no other people on site. That will mean any vendors, tradesman, or photographers will need to be absent. If our team cannot install when they arrive or need to re-attend due to unfinished works (e.g. carpeting, floorboards, painting etc), then additional charges will be incurred at $160 per hour, or part thereof.



Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:
<https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling/> <https://www.instagram.com/advantagestyling/>

P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287
Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019
www.advantagestyling.com.au <http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/>
